title: Veterans Advocacy Group Puts Corinthian Colleges On Blacklist
teaser: This past week, a group called Student Veterans of America announced a list of for-profit colleges that they claim are recruiting vets while simultaneously closing and selling off campuses. NPR's Eric Westervelt speaks with SVA president D. Wayne Robinson.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
